title: Lifting Mask Mandates: Yes or No?
sub_head: Students discuss if the demand for face coverings has exceeded the need.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss mask mandates. Next week we’ll ask, “College tuition has risen in the past few years, and inflation has made these changes more notable. How is inflation affecting college students? What led us here?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before March 1. The best responses will be published that night.
